message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider the decreasing value of the money - a quick agreement benefits us both.
Your offer was heavily in your favor. Let's be fair, a 55/45 split accounts for the decreasing value while ensuring a more equitable outcome.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal. However, time is literally money in this game.  I'll meet you in the middle - a 55/45 split is my final offer.
